description: A simple ping command to check the bot's latency and network speed.
install_msg:
> :white_check_mark: Successfully installed `ping`.
Use `[p]ping` to check the bot's latency and network speed. Make sure you load this cog with `[p]load ping`

Join our Discord! https://discord.gg/X8huyaeXrA
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores no user information
name: ping
short: Check bot's latency and network speed
